entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationManager In Blazor Web App Throws Exception On Form Post #52777
  • Perf regression: json #52774
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52773
  • Blazor: Scoped Services are disposed when circuit is closed when using some (but not all) components in a WebAsembly #52772
  • ASP00023 fails on multiple `HttpGet("[action]")]` #52770
  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from Blazor Web templates #52769
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor] Support serializing render fragments from SSR #52768
    Planning: WebUI
  • ExceptionHandler middleware mutes http_server_request_duration_seconds_count metrics on exceptions #52766
  • Are there any plans to provide runtime for 'linux-bionic-arm64'? #52764
  • Calling external .dll fails after upgrading to .NET 8 #52761
  • DefaultHttpResponse throws null ref when trying to access StatusCode (inside the AspNetCore library) #52760
  • Blazor 8 InteractiveServer : newly created cookie not available in second pass of MainLayout.razor #52759
  • Hot reload becomes very slow on Ubuntu with Blazor #52757
  • Avoid NRE in HttpContext debugger display with empty feature collection #52756
  • Blazor 'System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException' on .NET 8 #52755
    8.0.x
  • Blazor custom elements third-party embedded integration is very difficult to use. #52754
    Planning: WebUI

Closed

  • After update from .net6 to .net8 - first time CheckPasswordAsync will cause an exception if user is loaded with AsNoTracking #52602
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52690
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #52691
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52692
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla #52693
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #52694
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52696
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #52697
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52698
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla #52699
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52700
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #52701
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #52702
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #52703
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #52704
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, single_query #52456
  • Visual Studio 17.8 (Angular and ASP.NET Core Template fails on creation #52049
  • Blazor Server - HubFilter - Identifying called method #52555
  • Blazor WebAssemblyHostBuilder initialization fails if root component's assembly is not loaded on client startup #26601
    8.0.1
  • Blazor Server Side AADB2C AllowAnonymous Not working in latest template #39321
    8.0.0
  • MissingMethodException occured when deploying Blazor Server app with 'Trim Unused code' #40033
    Planning: WebUI
  • Improve prerendering and authentication experience in Blazor #27592
    Planning: WebUI
  • Ability to add rendermode to blazor layouts #52709
  • Allow multiple root components and/or render modes to be registered in Blazor Web Apps #52631
  • Blazor RenderTreeBuilder avoid boxing and strings allocations #52655
  • I Just Wonder If net8.0 Blazor Webassembly Can Be Decompiled #52712
  • .NET 8 Blazor Error 404 after upgrading from .NET 6 #52710
  • "Error: Cannot advance beyond the end of the Sibling array" appears when streaming rendering subcomponents #52371
  • [Blazor] Unnecessary Html comments in the script tag #52435
  • Set < routes@rendermode= "Interactive Server" / > how to set the component to static rendering mode #52503
  • Blazor Net 8 interactive auto <NotFound> not triggerd #52660
  • Blazor 8 InteractiveServer : cascading parameter passed from App to MainLayout is null during second pass #52758
  • Blazor Webassembly Authentication with OpenIDConnect endsession missing id_token_hint #43563
    Planning: WebUI
  • Angular 17 - SpaServices.Extensions - Wrong regex #52325
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #52695
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #52716
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #52742
  • Theme: JS Frontends with .NET Backends #47254
    8.0.0
  • Error unprotecting the IdentityServer signing key with kid {kid} #51839

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix Blazor enhanced form bugs #52765
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #52667
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #52737
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52652
    area-hosting
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52714
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Make user in ValidateAsync nullable #52604
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Add s390x support to the runtimearchitecture list #52722
    community-contribution, area-hosting, area-networking
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Use CreateAsyncScope instead of CreateScope for ExceptionHandler middleware #52687
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 9 Planning
